thecharacter makarbelongstonintendo makar korok pattern what you need ● crochet hook 4 mm ● yarn for 4 mm hook i used umissy yarn - 50g beige - 50g dark green ● toy stuffing/polyfill ● stitch marker ● tapestry needle ● scissors ● felt black ● sewing needle and black thread ● optional plastic gacha ball 2-3 cm diameter and bells abbreviations us terms ● single_crochet single_crochet ● chain chain ● half_double_crochet half-double_crochet ● double_crochet double_crochet ● tc treble_crochet ● increase increase 2sc in the same stitch ● decrease decrease crochet 2 stitches together ● … repeat from to notes ► the size of the finished toy is about 18 cm ► make sure to put enough gauge when crocheting so there are no holes in your work i use a crochet hook smaller than recommended for the selected yarn because it is easier to avoid holes this way ► this toy is made following a spiral to not lose count place a stitch marker at the beginning of each row a piece of yarn or a pin can serve as markers as well ► i use the needle and black thread to sew the details to the leaf using glue instead might be possible but i have not tested it ► if you need help with the pattern you can contact me by email beckysaurus rebs@gmail com i will answer your questions and help you go through the pattern ©beckysaurusrebs/rebecaquintero allrightsreserved
